NXS-CAD.summary: Nexus (NXS) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate NXS through the process of mining. Nexus has a current supply of 70,447,568.139873. The last known price of Nexus is 1.47412629 USD and is up 1.63 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $1,212,862.00 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://nexus.io/.
